name: OpenVPN - connect using a configuration file
description: Start an OpenVPN client using a provided .ovpn configuration file. Useful to connect into target VPNs for pivoting or accessing internal networks.

commands.name: Connect using .ovpn config (low verbosity)
commands.description: Run OpenVPN with a specified configuration file and low verbosity for cleaner logs. Uses elevated privileges to create tun/tap device.
